articles.title: Teenage sensation Nick Griggs breaks European U20 indoor mile record - Independent.ie
articles.description: After a year spent rampaging through the record books, this was the most ridiculous performance of all.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jack Denton, Jacob Sonenshine
articles.title: Stocks Slide on Impasse in Ukraine-Russia Talks and Rampant U.S. Inflation - Barron's
articles.description: Optimism over an end to the war in Eastern Europe fades as diplomats from Russia and Ukraine fail to agree on a cease-fire. U.S. inflation hit a 40-year high.
articles.content:
Stocks ended Thursday in the red after the latest war talks between Russia and Ukraine broke down and U.S. inflation clocked in at a 40-year high. The good news: Stocks rallied into the close.
